ygData.subject: Re: lindel
ygData.msgSnippet: This is a very active mailing list! 1st I have ever been on that has a thirst for game solving. Update of last night, I spent the night vanquishing gobs in sol
ygData.messageBody:
This is a very active mailing list!
1st I have ever been on that has a thirst for game solving.
Update of last night, I spent the night vanquishing gobs in sol A and spoke
to the gnomes there, err rather lack of speaking, nothing came of it.
As far as the 3rd book of tinkering, is it a fact that it exists? Sounds like
an extensive search of akanon has yielded nothing fruitful. I myself have
swam the depths in the past without finding anything.
As far as the inner circle goes, there is more then 1 guild that has this
type of set up. So i am assuming its a guild tagged or no, i would guess
tagged.
Its kind of a shame that if people have this information they wont share, its
not like we dont deserve to have special abilities we are gnomes!!
Diwzz Singez
Tribunal
